node.doctext:
Yet another chatterbox client, however this one works directly within E2 and your browser, and requires just the [squawkbox], the [notelet nodelet], and some [javascript|glue]. Simply follow [Notelet Nodelet Squawkbox Client|the instructions], and every time you visit the [squawkbox], the client will start itself. When you navigate away from the squawkbox, [Everything2|everything] goes back to normal.

It auto-refreshes your browser, but will not refresh if you are in the middle of typing a message. [Notelet Nodelet HTML tricks|Just some fun with HTML and the nodelet].
node.title: Notelet Nodelet Squawkbox Client
